titleStmt.title: The seaman's adieu to his pritty Betty: living near Wapping; or, A pattern of true love, &c. Sweet William to the seas was prest, and left his love behind; whilst she her sorrows oft exprest and blam'd the fates unkind. To the tune of, Tender hearts, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Deacon, at the Angel, in Guiltspur-street,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
